Transitions using <color-bg> css classes with text-center threshhold-<color>.png images

-----------------------------------------------------

BLACK color hex: #000000

div class="black-bg text-center" with img threshhold-yellow.png

WHITE color hex: #FFFFFF

div class="white-bg text-center" with img threshhold-black.png

YELLOW color hex: #FFC000

div class="yellow-bg text-center" with img threshhold-white.png

GRAY color hex: #A9A9A9

div class="gray-bg text-center" with img threshhold-yellow.png

YELLOW color hex: #FFC000

div class="yellow-bg text-center" with img threshhold-gray.png
